debugPanelIssues.issue: Debug panel z-index is too high
Debug panel missing pointer-events: none in inline styles
Debug panel missing user-select: none in inline styles
Debug panel missing z-index: 10 in inline styles

modalOverlayIssues.issue: Modal cleanup functions not found in page scripts

recommendations.action: Update ZoomAwareLayout.tsx to ensure debug panel has z-index: 10, pointer-events: none, and user-select: none
recommendations.code:
// In ZoomAwareLayout.tsx, line 113, update the debug panel:
<div className="zoom-debug-panel fixed bottom-4 left-4 z-10 bg-elevated border border-gold text-primary p-3 rounded-lg text-xs font-mono max-w-xs pointer-events-none user-select-none">
